name: Ninja Foldable Imported Shaker 550 ml
description:
Ninja Foldable Imported Shaker 550 ml

  • SAFE AND HEALTHY: Spike Protein shaker water bottles are 100% BPA and DEHP free and made from environmentally friendly, nontoxic and recyclable materials. All cups are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. Made With 5 PP (polypropylene). Polypropylene is a low-toxin plastic that is tolerant of heat.
  • NO LEAK LIDS: The wide mouth bottle cap locks in place to prevent messy spills from happening. Spike Protein shaker bottle is leak proof.
  • EASY TO TRANSPORT: The Spike Protein Shaker Bottle also includes a sturdy lid loop for easy transport to and from the gym. The Spike Protein Shaker is just the right size that fits in nearly all cup holders.
  • ODOR RESISTANT MATERIAL: Spike Protein Shaker is made with Tritan Plastic, which makes the cup odour resistant, so you don't have to gag down your sports drinks. It's also 100% BPA/BPS-free plastic to ensure supplements stay clean.
  • NO SHAKING ACCESSORIES NEEDED: Spike Protein Shaker Sipper Bottles come with a free Blender Shaker Ball.

name: SAN Nutrition 100% Pure Titanium Whey 5 lbs
description:
SAN Nutrition 100% Pure Titanium Whey 5 lbs

100% Pure Titanium Whey protein powder is perfect for serious athletes who demand quality protein to fuel their muscle gains. With 23 grams of protein per single-scoop serving, delicious flavour, and exceptionally easy mixing, 100% Pure Titanium Whey should be mandatory in any muscle-building arsenal.The quality ingredients have been clinically proven to increase muscle mass and improve strength. The quick-release protein formula means all the muscle-building nutrients get into your bloodstream quickly for improved recovery times and faster muscle gains.The quick-absorbing nature of 100% Pure Titanium Whey delivers an almost immediate burst of anti-catabolic nutrients while still ensuring an anabolic effect that can last up to four hours. That means your muscles won’t go hungry between meals.

Benefits

  • 23 grams of protein per serving
  • Promotes muscle building
  • Help reduce muscle breakdown
  • Easy to digest

Ingredients

Ultrafiltered Low Temperature Processed High Quality Instantized Whey Protein Concentrate (containing Micro Fractions) {Cow}, Cross Flow Microfiltrated Undenatured Whey Protein Isolate (includes Beta Lactoglobulin, Alpha Lactoalbumin) {Cow}, Natural And Artificial Flavors (Cocoa Powder [Processed with Alkali], Maltodextrin, Natural And Artificial Flavors and Extracts, Dextrose), Sodium Chloride, Sucralose

Usage

Take one scoop in 5-6 ounces of water once daily to satisfy your nutritional requirements. Use more or less liquid for desired taste and texture.
short_description:
SAN Nutrition 100% Pure Titanium Whey 5 lbs

Key Features:

  • 23 grams of quality whey protein per serving
  • Promotes nitrogen retention and muscle building
  • Prevents muscle breakdown/catabolism
  • High in branched-chain amino acids
  • High L-glutamine content
  • Easy mixing and delicious

name: Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules
description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Shedding flab off your body can be a daunting task and especially if you are an obese or extremely overweight. However, this task has to be accomplished because obesity is the cause of various cardiovascular issues and diabetes. Nutrex Lipo-6 Black capsules will catalyse your workout plan and lets you achieve your weight loss goals in the given time frame. The powerful unflavoured dietary supplement has a high potency, so one pill is enough to create the ripples inside your body. With so many weight-loss formulas in the market.

Benefits

Bitter Orange Extract: Fat Burner

Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Ultra Concentrate (UC) capsules Unflavoured by MPN are so powerful that just one pill a day is enough to blast off that fat off your body, albeit at a steady speed. The supplement is enriched with the properties of Advantra Z Citrus Aurantium that delivers the goodness of bitter orange extract, which as a result aids in faster weight loss. Moreover, the ingredient controls appetite and thereby helps you manage your portion intake and weight loss progress.

Theobromine Anhydrous-The ‘Push Your Limits’ Benefits

Another amazing ingredient in Nutrex Lipo-6 Black (UC) capsules is Theobromine Anhydrous increases mental focus during your training sessions and supports muscle recovery. The compound is similar to caffeine with an only difference for the time the latter stays in the body. In addition to this, Theobromine widens the blood vessels for proper blood and oxygen flow during exercise sessions. The vasodilatation property plays a key role in reducing fat from your body by giving you ample amount of energy to infuse in your training sessions.

Ingredients

Caffeine Anhydrous, Theobromine Anhydrous, Yohimbine Anhydrous, Rauwolscine, Glycerine, vegetable cellulose, water, Polysorbate 80, FD&C Blue 1, FD&C Red 40, FD&C Yellow 6.

Usage

Take 1 Black Capsule in the morning and 1 capsule in the afternoon. Never take more than 2 servings within 24 hours of the timeline. For best results, consume a pill 30 minutes prior to a meal.
short_description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Key Features:

  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Improves metabolism
  • Aids in faster fat-loss
  • Formulated as liquid capsules for faster absorption
  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black concentrated fat-loss formula
  • Advantra Z for an increased metabolic rate
  • Theobromine Anhydrous eliminates toxins from your body
  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black boosts concentration and focus for an effective weight loss session
